## Related Issues
Use keywords like "Closes", "Fixes", or "Resolves" followed by the issue link to automatically close the issue when this PR is merged. Examples:
- Closes #123
- Fixes #456
- Resolves #789

If this PR doesn't fully close the issue but is related, use:
- Related to #123
